subject: Re: [junit] Junit and RMI, please help ...
msgSnippet: ... Huh? ... driven clients. Would you elaborate please?  For manually driven clients, do you mean something I have already tried?  That is one client connects
messageBody:
>I would recommend writing a totally orthogonal spike.

Huh?

>Possibly something as simple as a dedicated server with two manually
driven clients.

Would you elaborate please? For manually driven clients, do you mean
something I have already tried? That is one client connects to the database
server to lock a record, another client connects and try to lock the record,
then manually close the OS window of the first client?

Regards,

Sam
